From: Bushra Shakhsheer <Bushra.Shakhsheer@puigme.com <mailto:Bushra.Shakhsheer@puigme.com> > 
Sent: Thursday, December 19, 2024 10:35 AM
To: Doris Hazzan <Doris.Hazzan@chalhoub.com <mailto:Doris.Hazzan@chalhoub.com> >
Cc: Alvaro Velar <Alvaro.Velar@puigme.com <mailto:Alvaro.Velar@puigme.com> >; Eduardo Zorzano <Eduardo.Zorzano@puigme.com <mailto:Eduardo.Zorzano@puigme.com> >; Cedric Riveccio <Cedric.Riveccio@puigme.com <mailto:Cedric.Riveccio@puigme.com> >
Subject: Chalhoub- RSO team for Marina Mall Abu Dhabi Byredo

 

Hi Doris,

Hope you are well and happy Holidays!

 

We need to communicate with the RSO team from Abu Dhabi for our Byredo unit as the store fit-out requires coordination with RSO prior and during construction along with 3D (hope you can direct us to the right contact)

 

We would like to inform them that we require the following to be completed/coordinated with 3D.

 

*        Public liability insurance for our store

*        Hassantuk certificate  This is done by the Chalhoub group PRO through RSO?

metadata.doc_id: C1L1LF1 - chalhoub- rso team for marina mall abu dhabi byredo\Conversation.txt
metadata.doc_path: C:\Users\ASUS\Desktop\Outlook\C1L1LF1 - chalhoub- rso team for marina mall abu dhabi byredo\Conversation.txt

chunks.text:
We would like to inform them that we require the following to be completed/coordinated with 3D.

 

*        Public liability insurance for our store

*        Hassantuk certificate  This is done by the Chalhoub group PRO through RSO?

*        CD Certified AMC  This is done by the Chalhoub Group Maintenance team / FM Team

*        Fitness certificate of the shop This is done by the PRO after Hassantuk Certificate

*        Tadweer registration, Pest control AMC & company license and their agreement with Tadweer. 

*        permanent power connection and meter transfer. How do we obtain. There will be forms to fill by the RSO and the GC will do the transfer 

*        Commercial License 

*        Owner documents. (EID, Mobile number and Email Id) our admin will provide.

 

 

Best regards,

 

	


 

Bushra R. Shakhsheer

Regional Retail Design & VM Project Manager

 



Dubai Design District

Building 7A, 203

Dubai, UAE

+971567799457 <tel:+971567799457> 

bushra.shakhsheer@puigme.com <mailto:bushra.shakhsheer@puigme.com>

From: Bushra Shakhsheer <Bushra.Shakhsheer@puigme.com <mailto:Bushra.Shakhsheer@puigme.com> > 
Sent: Thursday, December 19, 2024 10:35 AM
To: Doris Hazzan <Doris.Hazzan@chalhoub.com <mailto:Doris.Hazzan@chalhoub.com> >
Cc: Alvaro Velar <Alvaro.Velar@puigme.com <mailto:Alvaro.Velar@puigme.com> >; Eduardo Zorzano <Eduardo.Zorzano@puigme.com <mailto:Eduardo.Zorzano@puigme.com> >; Cedric Riveccio <Cedric.Riveccio@puigme.com <mailto:Cedric.Riveccio@puigme.com> >
Subject: Chalhoub- RSO team for Marina Mall Abu Dhabi Byredo

 

Hi Doris,

Hope you are well and happy Holidays!

 

We need to communicate with the RSO team from Abu Dhabi for our Byredo unit as the store fit-out requires coordination with RSO prior and during construction along with 3D (hope you can direct us to the right contact)

 

We would like to inform them that we require the following to be completed/coordinated with 3D.

 

*        Public liability insurance for our store

*        Hassantuk certificate  This is done by the Chalhoub group PRO through RSO?

*        CD Certified AMC  This is done by the Chalhoub Group Maintenance team / FM Team

*        Fitness certificate of the shop This is done by the PRO after Hassantuk Certificate

*        Tadweer registration, Pest control AMC & company license and their agreement with Tadweer.

metadata.doc_path: C:\Users\ASUS\Desktop\Outlook\C1L1LF1 - chalhoub- rso team for marina mall abu dhabi byredo\Conversation.txt

chunks.text:
*        CD Certified AMC  This is done by the Chalhoub Group Maintenance team / FM Team

*        Fitness certificate of the shop This is done by the PRO after Hassantuk Certificate

*        Tadweer registration, Pest control AMC & company license and their agreement with Tadweer. 

*        permanent power connection and meter transfer. How do we obtain. There will be forms to fill by the RSO and the GC will do the transfer 

*        Commercial License 

*        Owner documents. (EID, Mobile number and Email Id) our admin will provide.

 

 

Best regards,

 

	


 

Bushra R. Shakhsheer

Regional Retail Design & VM Project Manager

 



Dubai Design District

Building 7A, 203

Dubai, UAE

chunks.text:
Could you please confirm if we can coordinate with a single point of contact from the RSO team (yourself) to ensure that all project requirements are addressed and that the coordination of operational needs for the project opening is effectively managed?

We have compiled a list of the requirements on our end. It would be greatly appreciated if you could provide us with a list of any additional documents or information needed from our side, so we can have them prepared as the project progresses. The project construction will commence in April with a target opening of end of June. 

 

*        Public liability insurance for our store

*        Hassantuk certificate  This is done by the Chalhoub group PRO through RSO? 

*        CD Certified AMC  This is done by the Chalhoub Group Maintenance team / FM Team

*        Fitness certificate of the shop This is done by the PRO after Hassantuk Certificate

*        Tadweer registration, Pest control AMC & company license and their agreement with Tadweer. 

*        permanent power connection and meter transfer. How do we obtain. There will be forms to fill by the RSO and the GC will do the transfer 

*        Commercial License 

*        Owner documents. (EID, Mobile number and Email Id) our admin will provide.

 

Best regards,

	


 

Bushra R. Shakhsheer

Regional Retail Design & VM Project Manager

 



Dubai Design District

Building 7A, 203

Dubai, UAE

+971567799457 <tel:+971567799457> 

bushra.shakhsheer@puigme.com <mailto:bushra.shakhsheer@puigme.com>
